category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 20 (Responsibilities of Directors and Auditors)
contents: Article 20 (Responsibilities of Directors and Auditors) Article 382-3 (Director's Duty of Fidelity), Article 382-4 (Director's Duty to Maintain Confidentiality), Article 399 (Responsibility to the Company), Article 400 (Commercial Act) The provisions of Article 401 (exemption from liability to the company) and Article 401 (liability to third parties) apply mutatis mutandis to directors, respectively, and the provisions of Article 414 (auditor's responsibility) and Article 415 (application provisions) of the Commercial Act Matters concerning exemption from liability for the company shall apply mutatis mutandis to audits.
